title: When Is the Best Time to Fertilize Your Lawn in Chicago?
intro: A lush, green lawn is more than just grass; it’s the welcoming first impression of your Chicago home. But achieving that perfect curb appeal in our unique climate requires strategy. As general contractors who manage properties from the foundation to the roof, we at King Coleman Construction know that proper maintenance is key to value. The secret to a healthy lawn in Chicagoland isn’t just about what you use, but when you use it.
